ygData.subject: Re: What do you think about a few new spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I like this also but right now i think about you teleport right near sand giant wich you cannot see as you were to long way from him. SoW by any other name
ygData.messageBody:
At 13.32 26/05/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>
>These are very good ideas - I like them a lot. Instead of Haste though,
>I'd like to see Shadowstep become a Line-of-sight teleport spell (as
>someone on the list suggested earlier), and use that as our
>travelling/exploring spell.

I like this also but right now i think about you teleport right near sand
giant wich you cannot see as you were to long way from him.



SoW by any other name is still SoW.
>
>
>At 04:57 PM 05/26/1999 -0000, you wrote:
>>From: sdunn@...
>>
>>I've been thinking about a few new spells that Verant should implement,
>tell me what you all think. Most of these new spells is to reinforce the
>ability for wizards to travel, so far it appears that Druids are just as
>good, or even better then wizards with Spirt of the Wolf for traveling.
>>
>>Summon - Teleports group member inside the zone to your location
>>
>>Phase - Teleports yourself to location of other group member inside zone
>>
>>Greater Summon - Teleports group member to your location, even across zones
>>
>>Greater Phase - Teleports yourself to a group members location, even
>across zones
>>
>>Group Gate - Slow casting spell which teleports group to your bind spot,
>doesn't leave anyone behind
>>
>>Retreat - Evacuate version of group gate
>>
>>Haste - Increases movement rate for self only.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>What do lizards and rock music have in common?
>http://www.onelist.com
>They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!


Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
